Create a 3D animation short film featuring a character who overcomes obstacles and achieves their goals through hard work and dedication in Blender.
Develop a tutorial series on Blender that teaches users how to create realistic characters and environments using the software.
Create a virtual reality experience that allows users to explore and interact with a 3D world built in Blender.
Use Blender to create an interactive art installation that responds to user input and allows them to manipulate and transform the environment.
Develop a mobile app that uses Blender to create and edit 3D models, allowing users to create and customize their own characters and objects.
